Summary: A bright light w/ accompanying luminescence(invisible to the naked eye) on 2 separate photos, taken at approx. the same time, from 2 separate locations approx. 50 miles apart
divs: Sighting DetailsWe wish to remain anonymous, but feel the need to share this. I am passing this info on for the photographers. I was not a witness to either of the photo shoots. Here is the email I received from one of the photographers- the notes in parentheses are my additions "So today I was on the (Molokai) lanai and a huge Iwa bird(Frigate Bird) was just about 50 feet above the house. I ran to get my phone to shoot a photo and when I looked at it all I could see on the small photo was this strange green dot and the sun next to it. I posted it to ****** complaining that I missed the Iwa and almost instantly one of my friends on Maui said she got the same photo when she was trying to photograph an Iwa...ya sure, I thought. Then she posted her version...OK weird. Then I screen captured hers and made it larger and was totally freaked out. What the heck is that thing in the oval with the green dot. When I made mine larger I found the same image. I simply don't know what to think of it but thought you guys might like to be freaked out with me...I'm not going to sleep well tonite, " Please note that the bird is visible in Photo 2.
